title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the tangent line

g'(x) = f(x)+xf'(x)

g'(2) = f(2)+2f'(2) = 6+2(-1)=4

g(2)=2f(2)=12

Tangent line is y=4(x-2)+12
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the tangent line

g'(x) = f(x)+xf'(x)

g'(2) = f(2)+2f'(2) = 6+2(-1)=4

g(2)=2f(2)=12

Tangent line is y=4(x-2)+12

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the tangent line

g'(x) = f(x)+xf'(x)

g'(2) = f(2)+2f'(2) = 6+2(-1)=4

g(2)=2f(2)=12

Tangent line is y=4(x-2)+12

The student response earns two of the following points:

2 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the tangent line

g'(x) = f(x)+xf'(x)

g'(2) = f(2)+2f'(2) = 6+2(-1)=4

g(2)=2f(2)=12

Tangent line is y=4(x-2)+12

The student response earns all of the following points:

2 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for the tangent line

g'(x) = f(x)+xf'(x)

g'(2) = f(2)+2f'(2) = 6+2(-1)=4

g(2)=2f(2)=12

Tangent line is y=4(x-2)+12
